name: Delta Force: Xtreme
description: Powered by today's gaming technology, Delta Force®: Xtreme™ brings the classic Delta Force game back to life to face the enemy once more. As a member of the elite Delta Force, prepare yourself to take on over 60 levels of frantic single and multiplayer FPS action, including graphically enhanced missions from the original game, new maps,...
minimum_requirements: Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP/Vista Processor: Intel® Pentium® II 1.2 GHz or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Hard Disk Space: 820 MB Video Card: DirectX 9.0 AGP with 32MB or better with HW-T&L Sound Card: DirectX-compliant DirectX® Version: DirectX version 9.0b or higher (included)

reviews.review_text: Well its more or less of a reboot to the original Delta Force but theres something I noticed thats missing. For starters, theres no further options like the previous, such as allowing teams on or off, and the difficulty settings. Those what makes Delta Force a great game, this game is decent. Its a good run though, but too easy for me especially when you dont have the option to turn off respawn which is always on. This is something a child can beat.
